question:
Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to the purple ledge on the top floor. At your current location, if the topmost purple ledge is not in view, what is the most relevant object in view, and where is this object?  
choose:  
A. I see the purple window sill on the top floor in my field of view.  
B. I cannot see the purple window sill on the top floor, but there is a bus stop in my lower view.  
C. I cannot see the purple window sill on the top floor, but the front of the high-rise building is in the center of my field of view.  
D. I cannot see the purple window sill on the top floor, but the lake area in the park is in the lower right corner of my field of view.  
E. I cannot see the purple window sill on the top floor, but the top of a high-rise building is in the center of my field of view.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: E; Reason: The topmost purple ledge is not in view, but the top of a high-rise building is prominently visible in the center of the field of view. This aligns with option E, which correctly identifies the most relevant object in the current perspective.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 26)]
Option: [E]
Reason: From the initial position (0-26s), the purple ledge on the top floor is not visible. The top of a high-rise building is prominently visible in the center of the field of view. Therefore, option E is the correct answer.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: E; Reason: The topmost purple ledge is not in view, but the top of a high-rise building is prominently visible in the center of the field of view. This aligns with option E, which correctly identifies the most relevant object in the current perspective.
